sections.heading: contracts; validity; unaffected
sections.text: Nothing in sections 81-1701 to 81-1721 shall affect the validity of any contracts in existence on July 22, 1978.SourceLaws 1978, LB 715, ยง 21.

81-1721.Existing contracts; validity; unaffected.

Nothing in sections 81-1701 to 81-1721 shall affect the validity of any contracts in existence on July 22, 1978.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 715, ยง 21.
